attributes.action: Make 'Mad Jack' Churchill the face of the next £50 note.
attributes.background:
Make former WW2 Officer, LtCol Jack Churchill DSO MC, AKA 'Mad Jack' AKA 'Fighting Jack' the face of the Bank of England's next £50.

True hero, warrior and epitomy of Britishness.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
